website_summaries.verdict: Silicone pans have a bit of a learning curve, but they make removing homemade donuts super easy. Cleanup is a cinch, too.
pros: These colorful pans are high-quality silicone
It's super simple to remove donuts without sticking
Unlike many other brands, these make full-size donuts
cons: Put flexible silicone pans on a cookie sheet before baking
Some customers noticed chemical smell to the pans

customer_reviews.title: Would absolutely buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product, worked perfectly. Donuts cooked evenly and popped out easily. The silicone is a little flimsy, so you have to be careful picking it up. I baked both pans on a larger, metal pan to get it in and out of the oven easily.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle

customer_reviews.title: Easy Bake Bagels
customer_reviews.text: Great great product at an affordable price. I have made so far, two batches of Gluten free bagels and they cooked really nicely. After they cooled they were so easy to remove. I always brush a little oil in them before putting in the dough. I'm glad I bought this. For first time users remember its soft silicon, so logically you need to place them on a cookie sheet or shallow pan when placing in or removing from the oven.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Just as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I have cooked one batch of keto bagels using these items. Sprayed with cooking spray and bagels lifted out with no sticking. Popped into dishwasher and the two pans cleaned up beautifully. Use a cookie sheet under the pans. They are quite flexible so would be hard to handle without the rigid cookie sheet. I like them.
customer_reviews.author: Natgas Guy

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and functional
customer_reviews.text: I really like this set of 2 silicone donut pans. I've used them many times to make baked donuts. These pans fit perfectly in my toaster oven, which is a very convenient way to bake. Donuts release easily from these pans after they've cooled a little while. The silicone used for these donut pans comes in attractive colors and cleans easily. All in all, I am very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kate McMurryTop Contributor: Health & Wellness

customer_reviews.title: Not non stick
customer_reviews.text: I didn't think I'd have to spray these with non stick spray but I did. You'd think because their silicone you wouldn't have to but my donuts stuck the first time I baked with these pans. The colors are cute I'll say that much about them. And the price was good. Cleaning them I find that if I soak them it's much easier to get them clean.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, lame colors.
customer_reviews.text: Slight pain to clean thoroughly if anything at all gets stuck, only because you may have to pop out the concave part to clean it right. Overall and excellent donut tray though. My primary true gripe is getting pink and purple...not everyone ordering these is a female or effeminate male.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these! Easy to use and clean. I did spray them with non stick before use to ensure the doughnuts wouldn’t stick and placed the doughnut pans on a cookie sheet in the oven. I had no issue with smell and they held up very well. I was so happy with them that I ended up ordering my mother in law a set as well!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beware they stick and are not easy to use, Very flimsy as well.
customer_reviews.text: I have many silcone baking pieces and these are the worst. Batter baked properly but did not come out of the mold. Stuck to it and ruined the entire batch. If you have to grease these why buy them. Will try metal ones. Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Campany

customer_reviews.title: Waste
customer_reviews.text: I use these once and shoved them under the cabinet waste of money I hate everything about them pretty color but waste of my money
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Not quite sure about this purchase... Need to use more
customer_reviews.text: Only tried using them once... Made gluten-free donuts and they fell apart. Walls are kind of hard to clean two had to scrub quite a few times to get all the residue. But I’ve never made donuts before so I don’t know if it was my recipe or the molds
customer_reviews.author: Deb McNulty

customer_reviews.title: Hard to clean not very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I used them once so far and didn’t have the experience I thought I would. I made doughnuts and sprayed the mold but still found it a chore to clean. I also notice a slight smell when I first received them. They are manageable but not very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Mercedes

customer_reviews.title: Love these!!
customer_reviews.text: I use these to make protein donuts, perfect size!!!! They are a little smaller than regular donuts but aren’t too small. As long as you put non stick spray you won’t have trouble removing the donuts. They don’t get super hot so you can move them around almost as soon as you take them out of the oven:)
customer_reviews.author: LariLuvz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for making donuts - pastries . Non stick
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about these going in my oven so was very surprised at how great they worked . I love making my own donuts and these are cute and very useful .
customer_reviews.author: lisalisa38

customer_reviews.title: Really good!
customer_reviews.text: These are great but they need a baking tray under them. My first try i dumped the whole thing in my oven....I learned very quickly to use a baking tray. Easy clean up and dishwasher safe.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Ok molds
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit disappointed to find that I have to grease the molds for a clean release. I was hoping the donuts could just be popped out, but the molds do work but some of the donuts end up broken.
customer_reviews.author: Jean K

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I use low carb flour that tends to stick more then regular flour, but these pop right out.
customer_reviews.author: KATHYE

customer_reviews.title: Mini Donut Silicon Bakin Pan
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I expected. Not easy to remove the donuts once they're done. Not easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Lorenzo

customer_reviews.title: SMALL NOT AVERAGE SIZE DONUTS
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. I purchased these because people were commenting that they were the average size of a donut and they definitely arent.. will be returning.. very bummed out
customer_reviews.author: OhMyShaine

customer_reviews.title: Fun to use but a little tough to clean
customer_reviews.text: So much fun to do with the grand kids. I don't like to use non stick sprays but if you don't these are tough to clean and things stick
customer_reviews.author: HappyQuilter

customer_reviews.title: Little Bagels
customer_reviews.text: This makes small Bagels its perfect and works good in the oven. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Diana S

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: These "pans" are perfect for making donuts at home. Easy to clean, nonstick, and compact enough.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: easy to use and a dream to clean
customer_reviews.text: I FIND THAT BY PLACING THEM ON A COOKIE SHEET AND THEN PUTTING THEM IN THE OVEN IT IS EASIER TO GET THEM IN AND OUT
customer_reviews.author: Nancy K.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Use this all the time and love it. Food doesn't stick and it's so easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Not a good bargain
customer_reviews.text: Everything sticks to it. Tried spray but then it was greasy
customer_reviews.author: Ann Marie

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: These were a great little buy! I wanted to test out some recipes so i didnt want to spend a ton on these pans, these were great! They do the job! A little bit hard to clean, but overall im happy with them!
customer_reviews.author: Alison M

customer_reviews.title: Super awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I got this to make some keto bagels, super excited about this product!
customer_reviews.author: Deb M

customer_reviews.title: Food sticks
customer_reviews.text: It’s hard to remove food leftovers from the mold. Don’t want to scratch it with the fiber, so left it in water for the past 4 days. Still not coming out easy. Also stains from food. Regular oat and blueberry donuts.
customer_reviews.author: Nextdoormom

customer_reviews.title: Can’t beat this !
customer_reviews.text: These are so cool! I can’t wait to use them for other projects. My donuts came out so beautiful and cleaning the mold was pretty easy.
customer_reviews.author: Tasha

customer_reviews.title: My kids love them
customer_reviews.text: My kids love the donut pans very easy to use. Very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Titus b

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: These are great little silicone molds. The only cons are the size and they're a bit flimsy. I am using them for bagels as well as donuts and they come out a bit small. Make sure you use a cookie sheet or tray underneath to support the molds.
customer_reviews.author: Heather H

customer_reviews.title: Not regular size donuts
customer_reviews.text: I would give 5 stars but these are not full size. They are the size between full size and mini. Maybe because I'm in America and bagels and donuts in stores are larger, but these are not full size pans.
customer_reviews.author: Jody Foisy

customer_reviews.title: Would collapse without rigid support.
customer_reviews.text: I have to put the pans on a cookie sheet for safety of handling while using them. Otherwise they’d collapse. If the edges were somehow made rigid it would solve the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Louise A

customer_reviews.title: Not Perfect but Got the Job Done
customer_reviews.text: This product is not nonstick and on the small side. Overall I am pleased. The pan is easy to use and clean. After applying cooking spray the donuts were easy to remove.
customer_reviews.author: KalCat

customer_reviews.title: Prone to sticking
customer_reviews.text: Prone to sticking so prep them accordingly before placing any batter in them. My silicone mini loaf pans don’t stick therefore I didn’t expect these to so I didn’t oil them before I used them.
customer_reviews.author: Alyx

customer_reviews.title: Mini sized
customer_reviews.text: Food did not stick to it but was very tiny then what I had imagined it would be . More like mini donuts . I wanted a regular donut size but it works .
customer_reviews.author: rhonda hamilton

customer_reviews.title: wonderful buy
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent, have made several types of keto doughnuts and no sticking issues.
customer_reviews.author: M. Shah

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: A little more flimsy than expected, but I Bake with them on a Sheet pan
customer_reviews.author: AunetPadgett

customer_reviews.title: These are NOT non stick.
customer_reviews.text: They're very flimsy so be careful with them. They are 100% not non stick.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: These molds are awesome. Can't wait to try even more keto donut recipes!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Fish

customer_reviews.title: Very difficult to use
customer_reviews.text: I didn't care for this product at all. Despite following the directions, I found it pretty difficult to remove the donuts without breaking them.
customer_reviews.author: R. Middleton

customer_reviews.title: make beautiful cakes!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my ! They make the best donuts, and they don't stick! Just use all cooking spry if ya like. They came out beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: KIMBERLY JASON

customer_reviews.title: Good donut pan
customer_reviews.text: I really like this donut pan. I used it without greasing it first so the donuts were a little difficult to remove, but I will try it again with some grease next time. The donuts turned out perfectly though!
customer_reviews.author: Cari

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't use this for food, good for making squishies though
customer_reviews.text: not just silicon its mixed with something else and it smells bad makes your food smell bad too.
customer_reviews.author: matt maines

customer_reviews.title: Great Value, production level A1!
customer_reviews.text: The size of the pans are perfect! Great for the kids to learn new cooking techniques!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Barker

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great value. I am vegan and made beautiful donuts that came right out!
customer_reviews.author: RootedLife1

customer_reviews.title: Easy clean
customer_reviews.text: I used these to make keto bagels and there are really easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: These molds are awesome. Super easy to clean and my bagels popped right out. I recommend these to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Small but Nice for Kids Treats
customer_reviews.text: Small not a real doughnut size more like the size of your palm. But they are still nice and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: RiveraFAM

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love making donuts and this helps with me making my keto donuts..
customer_reviews.author: Angela Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: makes great donuts
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is that it's great. Easy to remove and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Used them to make foam doughnuts for theater production. They worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes baking donuts a breeze
customer_reviews.text: Bought to make my own donuts. Baking and cleanup was a breeze! Sprayed with cooking oil spray before adding batter and donuts popped right out. Flexible silicone makes it easy to turn over baking "pan" and pop the stubborn donut out if it's sticking. Soaked to get rid of baked on batter, wiped clean. I placed these on a baking sheet because they are flimsy and are hard to put into the oven and take out because of the flexible nature of the silicone.
customer_reviews.author: Plantlovr

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: These are definitely smaller than I expected. They work well, but probably half the size of regular donuts
customer_reviews.author: Laura S.

customer_reviews.title: Go Nuts and Make Bagels and Donuts!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to make some low carb bagels. These donut molds seemed like a good choice instead of buying another metal baking item to fit into my kitchen cabinets. These are so simple and easy to bake bagels in! I'm sure they will make some good donuts too!
customer_reviews.author: Luckeegurl

customer_reviews.title: Worked great
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to make donuts and bagels and these worked great. Make sure not to over-fill if you want things to come out traditionally shaped. I always put oil or non-stick spray to make sure items come out easily. Cleans with a wipe of a soapy cloth.
customer_reviews.author: Texas

customer_reviews.title: They'll work
customer_reviews.text: These are fine... They were stuck together, so had a little time separating them... They are a little on the thin side, but for the price, and my intended purpose, they should be fine... If that changes, I'll change my rating...
customer_reviews.author: Moonlyght

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Smaller-than-expected.. very flexible make sure you place them on a cookie sheet when using them..
customer_reviews.author: yla64

customer_reviews.title: So pretty!
customer_reviews.text: Have not used them yet - but love the bright colors! Now I am on the hunt for Almond Flour so I can use the recipe I got them for.
customer_reviews.author: KnitPurple

customer_reviews.title: It is worth buying.
customer_reviews.text: I buy molds through the Internet that are very flimsy and this was a nice sturdy mold of good quality. I would recommend it to others especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Patton

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed with these. Made some donuts and they stuck completely and had to scrape them out. Also not easy to clean since everything was stuck.
customer_reviews.author: S. Lancaster

customer_reviews.title: Kinda thin
customer_reviews.text: Pan is pretty thin, and make sure to grease it. Doesn’t release like most silicone pans do. Other than that it does work.
customer_reviews.author: rock fan

customer_reviews.title: Greet
customer_reviews.text: Item is great just as explained. Easy to use, easy to clean no foul smell.
customer_reviews.author: jackie

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: These are easy to clean and very stable. I took my homemade doughnuts out of the silicone with no sticking. They are very flexible and easy store away as well.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: I made keto bagels with these. Bagels popped right out with zero sticking. Cleanup was therefore a breeze. I kept one and gave other to my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Lynnette S

customer_reviews.title: Non stick
customer_reviews.text: These molds are great for making bagels or donuts. They slide right out of the mold and the cleanup is very easy.
customer_reviews.author: gigi

customer_reviews.title: Very happy!
customer_reviews.text: They came fast and work awesome! Plus I love the colors!!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Perish

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality but not as easy to use as one might expect
customer_reviews.text: These are a quality product. However, since they are donut shapes, it is harder to clean all the nooks etc. Maybe if one sprays more? But, I did spray and need to hand clean several of the donuts.
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: I make apple cider donuts once a year very easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: lakesha bey

customer_reviews.title: Baked doughnuts
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my granddaughter who’s favorite food is doughnuts.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Such a great addition to my Baking Ware. Love these!
customer_reviews.author: Breanna

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Really liked this product cause it worked perfectly for baking donuts 🍩
customer_reviews.author: Julie G

customer_reviews.title: Safe for microwave.
customer_reviews.text: Can be used in microwave. Haven't tried to use for baking. No instructions with it.microwave safe.
customer_reviews.author: pjd

customer_reviews.title: Work well!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for making low carb gluten free low sugar donuts for our kids!
customer_reviews.author: Susan M. Burke

customer_reviews.title: For more than sweet snacks
customer_reviews.text: We use these every week for something and they're still like new months later
customer_reviews.author: Chris C.

customer_reviews.title: Great pan!
customer_reviews.text: Does its in intended purpose, and that's to make donuts. No problems, very easy to maneuver.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Bradford-Majors

product_meta.title: KLEMOO 2-Pack Donut Baking Pan, Silicone, Non-Stick Mold, Bake Full Size Perfect Shaped Doughnuts to Sweeten Your"Hole"
product_meta.description:
Color:2 Pack
One Way to Ensure Morning is a Good Morning 

Let's face it, most of us don't leap out bed with a giant grin on our faces. 
Scratchy,the monotonously repetitive breakfast only add irritation to your morning routine, so why eat them? 

Put a Bit of Tasty, Heath, Color in Your Breakfast 

Just need these KLEMOO non-stick donut pans to bake doughnuts, these donuts are oozed with rich custards and creams 
Covered with mouthwatering topping and bursting with big flavor to start your day off right. 
That's how simple it is to make doughnuts using this non-stick donut pan, fill each well 3/4 full, then place the pan on a cookie sheet for transfer into the oven. 
You will get 12-full perfect shaped donuts at a time, finish them with a colorful glaze or sprinkles and serve them with a mug of hot milk. 

Every Day is a Donut Day: So Digestiable a Child can Eat Them 

Maybe National dount day and Mardi Gras is a good excuse to eat a donut or two, but you still want more. 
This non-stick donut pan is a great place to start your doughnuts celebrations, these donuts are bakes, not fried, tend to be lower in fat and more healthier. 
Delicious, colorful, vibrant, making them a better everyday breakfast choice for most of us. 

Normal Size: More Suitablr for the Family 

Donut Pan are 10"x7"x1" 
Doughnuts measure 2.9" 
2 Pack: Pink + Purple

KLEMOO is the Amazon registered brand and a culinary expert of kitchen cookware and cooking accessories. 
KLEMOO’s focus is making cooking quick, easy, healthy, and more accessible to the home cook. 
Please feel free to contact us for a full refund if you are unhappy with the product for any reason.
feature_bullets: 100% silicone, non-stick donut pan means the donuts are easier to pop out and keep perfect shape,bursting with sweet flavor to wake you up
Donut pan offer a health way to enjoy donuts and these doughnuts eliminates the oily mess and it reduce the amount of fat
2-Pack, idea for family projects, spend some together time with these homemade donuts activities that foster sharing, relaxing and fun
Make cleanup is a breeze, naturally non-stick for quick release, nothing stuck! Save so much time on cleanup and make your life much easier.
Enjoy baking with your favorite recipes and donuts perfect for pairing with tea in the afternoon, make clean up a breeze

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars497 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
